mainSubject: Sensor reliability and wireless connectivity issues
painPoints: Sensor intermittently stops tracking even at 8000Hz
Issue persists even when plugged in
Dongle did not work on first unit
Poor reliability for a high-priced product
improvementSuggestions: Better quality assurance especially for premium-priced products

positives: No functional flaws in the product
painPoints: Comparable performance available in cheaper alternatives
improvementSuggestions: Reduce price to better reflect value
Differentiate the product more from cheaper alternatives
